My dragon is weird!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): My dragon is weird!
By koosen on Monday, January 14, 2002 - 06:03 pm:

For some reason my dragon never gets greats on its training unless it is a little tired, which seems to be contary to what i have read on this site. I dislike this quality becuase my dragon usually has to rest afterwards because it was already a little tired, and because of this i cant get it to get multipule greats in a row, by telling it "as expected". Is there anyway to change when my dragon has his best training sessions?thanks

By Anonymous on Thursday, February 21, 2002 - 11:16 am:

Tigon if he does great i tell him as expected and he does two or three greats in a row... but what do you tell him when he fails? i tell him to keep at it and then he gets a couple successes and back to greats... maybe you should try this too...
also i think as they get older and you keep them in an easier training place they are more likely to get greats... hope this helps you and anyone else.

By Anonymous on Tuesday, April 16, 2002 - 11:26 am:

Thats B.S. My Dragon/Brilla Does Great After 1 yr age.
